---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://www.billboard.com/charts/hot-100/"

html <- read_html(url)

nodes <- html %>% html_nodes("div.o-chart-results-list-row-container")
```

```{r}
nodes %>% 
  html_nodes("li.lrv-u-width-100p") %>% 
  html_nodes("h3") %>% 
  html_text2()
```
